players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Bob is the mafioso and we should vote him out today."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie. Bob is the mafioso and we must vote him out to win."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. I will continue to protect my family tonight."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Bob is the mafioso and we must vote him out today."
